name: 楊勝明
objective:
本課程的主要目的在使用 Matlab/Simulink 軟體，建立馬達及其控制系統的模型，以模擬的方式學習馬達控制系統設計的方法。控制的馬達包含直流馬達、永磁交流馬達、及無刷直流馬達等三種。系統設計的主題包含：(1) 位置、速度及電流控制，(2) 數位控制，(3) 觀測器設計，(4) 直接轉矩控制，(5) 脈寬調變模，(6) 交流 - 直流轉換。

The objectives of this course are using Matlab/Simulink software as the simulation tool to learn practical control schemes for electric machines. Three types of machines are studied: DC Machine, permanent magnetic synchronous machines (PMSM), and brushless DC (BLDC). Control projects include: (1) position, velocity, and current control, (2) digital control, (3) estimators, (4) direct torque control, (5) pulse width modulation (PWM), (6) AC-DC conversion.
schedule:
1. Introduction of Matlab/Simulink, DC Motor model, speed control (lab1)
2. PMSM model and V/H control (lab2)
3. Current control and frequency response measurement (lab3)
4. Digital position control (lab4)
5. Position control with velocity estimator (lab5)
6. DC-AC Inverter (SPWM) (lab6)
7. 清明節補假
8. Discontinuous PWM schemes (lab7)
9. Mid-term exam.
10. Sensorless vector control with extended back-EMF (lab8)
11. Sensorless vector control with stator flux estimator (lab9)
12. Initial position detection with square voltage HFVI (lab10)
13. PMSM control simulation with Simscape (lab11)
14. PMSM control system with input AC-DC converter (lab12)
15. BLDC commutation (lab13)
16. Speed control of BLDC (lab14)
17. Review
18. Final exam.
materials:
1. 永磁同步電動機之原理與應用，北科大電機系 113/01 學期 class note.
2.Control System Design Guide, 3th Editions, George Ellis, Elsevier-Academic Press.
3.Observers in Control Systems, George Ellis, Elsevier-Academic Press, 2010.
4. 控制系統設計與模擬 - 使用 Matlab/Simulink, 李宜達，全華圖書，2011.
